00003  * __COPYRIGHT__ GT

00006 #define COMPONENT_NAME "none"
00007 
00008 #ifdef BPRED_PARSE_ARGS
00009 if(!strcasecmp("none",type))
00010 {
00011   return new fusion_singleton_t();
00012 }
00013 #else
00014 
00015 class fusion_singleton_t:public fusion_t
00016 {
00017   public:
00018 
00019   fusion_singleton_t(void)
00020   {
00021     init();
00022 
00023     num_pred = 1;
00024     name = strdup(COMPONENT_NAME);
00025     if(!name)
00026       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion singleton name (strdup)");
00027     type = strdup("none");
00028     if(!type)
00029       fatal("couldn't malloc fusion singleton type (strdup)");
00030 
00031     bits = 0;
00032   }
00033 
00034   /* LOOKUP */
00035   FUSION_LOOKUP_HEADER
00036   {
00037     BPRED_STAT(lookups++;)
00038     scvp->updated = false;
00039     return preds[0];
00040   }
00041 
00042   /* REG_STATS */
00043   FUSION_REG_STATS_HEADER
00044   {
00045     /* nada: don't bother registering any stats when there's only one
00046        component predictors since the stats will be identical. */
